title: Messages and Photos: different notification sounds?
content: Hi, on my Pixel 2 I like to have different notification sounds for different apps, and I set most of them up this way. However, I don't seem to be able to have different sounds for Messages and Photos. They only seem to be able to use the default system notification or stay quiet. Am I missing something here? Every time Photos has a new stylised photo I think I have an important message from someone. :-(
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
